description.description: Always put the base description here, that also apply to TM characters

upgrades.description: Put upgrade by ascending order like LB level (ie: 1 -> 6) Do not repeat the base description here

cost.description:
Specify cost only if different from those default value:
- Legend: 55
- Kizuna, TM, PR: 35
- PR RR, < 4* without evolution: 20
- Others: 30

description.description: Always put the latest special stage here

stages.description: Put stage by ascending order (ie: 1 -> 6) but without the latest you have already specified above
